text: Harold Milton Hull (May 16, 1920 – May 5, 1988) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Akron Goodyear Wingfoots during the 1941–42 season and averaged 1.2 points per game. After his basketball career he earned a juris doctor from the University of Missouri and opened a private practice in Maryville, Missouri. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Akron Goodyear Wingfoots players Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Missouri Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Missouri lawyers Category:Northwest Missouri State Bearcats men's basketball players Category:People from Nodaway County, Missouri Category:University of Missouri School of Law alumni
title: Harold Hull
